headline: Morning Headlines: Jon Fuime named Akron Art Museum executive director; Cedar Fair rejects SeaWorld takeover

Jon Fuime named Akron Art Museum executive director
(WKSU) -- After nearly two years as interim director, the board of the Akron Art Museum has named Jon Fiume to the permanent post.

Bill would extend vouchers to all Ohio schoolchildren
(AP) — A new bill that would expand educational vouchers to allow K-12 public students in Ohio to attend private schools with state dollars had its first hearing in the Ohio House Finance committee Tuesday.
